fontTheory.description: The typography system for this resume aims to balance professionalism with modernity, ensuring readability and visual appeal.
fontTheory.readability: Careful consideration has been given to font sizes, line spacing, and contrast to enhance readability across various devices.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The typographic hierarchy is established through font sizes, weights, and styles to guide the reader through the resume sections effectively.
fontTheory.fontPairings: The font pairings have been chosen to create a harmonious blend of traditional and contemporary styles, maintaining a cohesive visual identity.
